description: Managing cross-functional teams to deliver innovative software products and coordinating with engineering teams to ensure timely project completion.
Developing scalable web applications using React and Node.js, leading code reviews, and mentoring junior developers.

Designing intuitive user experiences for automotive software interfaces and implementing responsive web applications.
